org.apache.jena.fuseki

Class Fuseki

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.fuseki.Fuseki

  • public class Fuseki
extends Object

    The main class enabling us to:

    1. create instances of a Fuseki server e.g. the ARQ, RIOT and TDB server stack
    2. get server global Context e.g. named values used to pass implementation-specific parameters across general interfaces.
    3. get the SPARQLServer instance.
    4. set the SPARQLServer instance.
